moves.description: Scaffold the project repo and install all dependencies (Node 20+, Vite, Tailwind, PostCSS, Prettier, Stylelint, axe-core, Framelink, NCP, @squoosh/cli)
moves.details: Set up the initial project structure and ensure all required tools and packages are installed.

moves.description: Configure Tailwind, PostCSS, Prettier, and Stylelint
moves.details: Add and configure tailwind.config.js, postcss.config.js, Prettier, and Stylelint for the project.

moves.description: Set up Vite dev server and basic index.html with live reload
moves.details: Create a minimal index.html and ensure Vite dev server runs with hot reload.
Prompt user to upload section screenshots and names, one at a time, storing them for conversion.

moves.description: Automate export of each section screenshot to responsive HTML partial styled with Tailwind
moves.details: Convert each uploaded image to a partial in src/sections/<slug>.html.

moves.description: Extract and optimize image assets, reference with lazy-loaded img tags
moves.details: Save sliced images to src/assets/ and use loading="lazy" in markup.

moves.description: Assemble all partials into index.html for live preview and allow reordering
moves.details: Ensure index.html includes all section partials and can be reordered by editing the include list.
Generate /reports/ for each build and ensure all metrics are met.
Add automated tests for section conversion and accessibility if time allows.

moves.description: Prepare README and hand-off for review
moves.details: Document setup, build, and QA instructions.
